cgcloud__Segmentation_Rule_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Segmentation_Rule_Template__c
cgcloud__Segmentation_Rule_Template__c.description: This object contains information that configures the behavior for the associated segmentation rules.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: Reference to the owner of the segmentation rule template record.

cgcloud__Private__c.description: Defines whether the segmentation rule is private.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the segmentation rule template belongs.
